post:
![](https://maximumvps.net/img/maxvps2111.png)  
  
**Maximum Virtual Private Servers LLC is a Washington State registered LLC. We have been in business since February 2013. Launched publicly here at LET!**

Quick AUP: We do not allow camfrog, virtual currency mining, TOR exit nodes. [Full AUP here.](http://maximumvps.net/clients/aup.php)    
  
**KVM64, $1.37/month || $8.50/year** ([order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=9))   
  
* 1 Core  
* 64 MB RAM  
* 5 GB HDD  
* 56 GB Traffic  
* 1 Gbps Port  
* 1 IPv4 address  
* IPv6 on request  
* RDNS on request  
  
**KVM128, $2.74/month** ([order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=11&sld=whmcs&tld=.com))  
  
* 1 Core
* 128 MB RAM
* 10 GB HDD
* 128 GB Traffic
* 1 Gbps Port
* 1 IPv4 address
* IPv6 on request
* RDNS on request  

**KVM256, $4.11/month** ([order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=12&sld=whmcs&tld=.com))

* 2 Cores
* 256 MB RAM
* 15 GB HDD
* 256 GB Traffic
* 1 Gbps Port
* 1 IPv4 address
* IPv6 on request
* RDNS on request  

**KVM512, $7.00/month** ([order](https://maximumvps.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=10&sld=whmcs&tld=.com))

* 4 Cores
* 512 MB RAM
* 25 GB HDD
* 512 GB Traffic
* 1 Gbps Port
* 2 IPv4 addresses
* IPv6 on request
* RDNS on request  

Need more IPv4 addresses, traffic, HDD space or CPU cores? Contact us!

**Operating systems**

Our KVM64-256 plans are low-RAM and only support a few operating systems, such as:

* Debian 6 (manually upgradeable to Debian 7)
* DSL
* Tiny Core
* Alpine
* Austrumi

Others are available as well, but install and test at your own risk. 

**Test files and IPs:** These can be found at our [looking glass](http://lg.maximumvps.net/) page, along with other networking testing utilities.

**Location:** Our colocated owned nodes are located at [Quadranet](http://quadranet.com/) (_not_ via ColoCrossing OR another providers cabinet) at their Los Angeles, California datacenter. Their network provides native IPv6 connectivity (no tunnelling), and great connectivity to Asia and Australia. Providers include nLayer, Tiscali/Inteliquent, PCCW/BTN, Equinix LAIIX Any2Exchange, Host.net, HiNet Taiwan, and ChinaUnicom Direct.

**Our current node specifications:** Dual L5420, 16GB RAM, 4 x 1TB WD RE drives, Adaptec 4305 RAID with BBU
